channel.title: Visualization on Z!!V | Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Z!!V | Data Science Portfolio

item.title: HR Analytics
item.description: Objective: Identifying, classifying and quantifying the productivity of emplopyees. Calculate ROI of emplopyee initiatives Helps in supporting the business decisions with the backing of data.

item.title: NLP Projects
item.description: There are 6 short and cool projects under this one section.

item.title: IRIS
item.description: Project done while being an internee @ The Sparks Foundation

item.title: Cryptocurrency EDA
item.description: Build a webapp using streamit and deployed on heroku, used python and other important scikit libraries.

item.title: Flight Price Prediction
item.description: Curated data using firstly with automated analysing and based on that manually cleaned the data.

item.title: Credit Card Lead Generation
item.description: Identifying customers that could show higher intent towards a recommended credit card.

item.title: Zomato Rating Prediction
item.description: Perform extensive Exploratory Data Analysis(EDA) on the Zomato Dataset which will be described as below as you scroll down.

item.title: Bank Note Authentication
item.description: Purpose of the project was to predict the whether the bank notes were authenticate or they are fake.

item.title: Air Pollution
item.description: Purpose of the project was to predict the air quality of Bengaluru city based on the data which was scrapped from the multiple sites and later after processing it was converted into a csv file using BeautifulSoup.

item.title: Out Of Office
item.description: The purpose of the project was to predict based on the data whether an employee is going to be absent or not, on their daily work routine.
